Profile.description:
In-discord friend and profile system for Magia Record. Includes features such as fetching data from in-game profiles, a follower request system, notification system, and support look up.

__**Subcommands**__

fields.name: {command} create in-game-friend-id
fields.value:
Creates or, if previously deleted, restore your profile with your in-game friend ID. 
___

fields.name: {command} check @User/User#Tag/Discord UserID
fields.value:
Displays condensed version of player data. 
___

fields.name: {command} supports @User/User#Tag/Discord UserID
fields.value:
Displays detailed player data. 
___

fields.name: {command} notify on/off
fields.value:
Enables or disables notifications. When on, the bot will send DM you on follows and your follower status. 
___

fields.name: {command} set in-game-friend-id
fields.value:
Updates your profile's friend ID. 
___

fields.name: {command} follow/unfollow @User/User#Tag/Discord UserID
fields.value:
Follow or unfollow a given user 
___

fields.name: {command} following/followers/mutuals
fields.value:
Get a list of who you are **following**, your **followers**, and your **mutual** followers. 
___

fields.name: {command} list page-#
fields.value:
List all profiles. 10 profiles are listed per page. Page number must be provided. 
___

fields.name: {command} delete
fields.value:
Delete your profile. 
___

Event.description:
Provides information for the ongoing in-game events and a countdown to its conclusion 
___

fields.name: Usage
fields.value: {command}

React.description:
Reacts to a message with a custom reaction from another server to allow user reactions. 

 Will remove reaction after short period of time. 
___

fields.name: Usage
fields.value:
{command} message-id emote-name

React to message with matching message-id using reaction with matching name 
___

fields.name: Supported Servers
fields.value:
PMMM:Magia Record
Magireco Emotes For Discord Whales
/r/MadokaMagica (pending)

Emoji.description:
Displays tracked emoji usage in messages and reactions. Only tallies currently active emojis. 

 If nothing is added to the command, it will print the server's total usage. 

 __**Subcommands**__

fields.name: `{command}` | `{command} s` | `{command} server`
fields.value:
Get emoji usage for the current server.
___

fields.name: `{command} u` | `{command} user`
fields.value:
Get emoji usage for yourself.
___

fields.name: `{command} u @someone` | `{command} user username#id`
fields.value:
Get emoji usage for a specific mentioned user.
___

fields.name: `{command} thinking` | `{command} emoji thinking`
fields.value:
Get a list of usage by person of a currently active server emoji.
___

fields.name: `{command} reaction` | `{command} r` | `{command} reaction username#id`
fields.value: List reaction emoji usage either by server or by an optional user target

fields.name: time
fields.value:
{command} 1s | {command} u 2min | {command} 3h e | {command} @user 4d | {command} 5m | {command} 10y

Can be add to the command to limit the scope of time. Must be an integer combined with a valid key.

fields.name: s
fields.value: seconds

fields.name: min
fields.value: minutes

fields.name: h
fields.value: hours

fields.name: d
fields.value: days

fields.name: m
fields.value: months

fields.name: y
fields.value: years

Wlink.description:
Generates a link by combining the server's registered wiki site and a user provided page name.
___

fields.name: Usage
fields.value:
{command} Example Page
___

fields.name: Name Search
fields.value:
{command} Madoka

Given first or last name, generates a link to character's page.
___

fields.name: Shortcuts
fields.value: Users can create single keyword shortcuts using the `wadd` command. This command will first search through shortcuts to find pages before generating a link based on user provided text.

Wadd.description:
Adds a single word keyword as a shortcut to a longer page for `wlink` for the server.
___

fields.name: Usage
fields.value:
`{command} favorite Tokiwa Nanaka` creates the keyword shortcut 'favorite' for the wlink command.`
___

Wdelete.description:
Deletes an existing single word keyword shortcut added by `wadd`.
___

fields.name: Usage
fields.value:
{command} favorite

This deletes the keyword `favorite` from the list of shortcuts if previously set.
___

Help.description:
Use `{command} command` to get help texts for specific commands.

__**List of Commands**__

fields.name: e or emoji
fields.value:
Get emoji usage data. 
___

fields.name: w or wlink
fields.value:
Generate link to the server's registered wiki.
___

fields.name: wadd
fields.value:
Create a keyword shortcut for `wlink`.
___

fields.name: wdelete
fields.value:
Delete a keyword created by `wadd`.
___

fields.name: r or react
fields.value:
Have the bot react to a given message with a custom reaction
___

fields.name: event
fields.value: Provides information for the ongoing in-game events and a countdown to its conclusion

fields.name: p or profile
fields.value: Bot-managed friend and profile system for Magia Record Discord
